name: Cardbob: Revival
description:
Go on runs defeating enemies, collecting items for your shop, and coming back. Sell that loot and grow stronger!

  • sci-fi cardboard world
  • action roguelite
  • tens of upgrades
  • sword slashing and throwing
  • procedural generation
  • gamepad optimized

Your melee and ranged weapons are the same! if you  throw all of them, there will be none left for close range combat, stay safe friend!

  • F1 - feedback menu
  • Gamepad - best experience
  • left stick - walk and aim
  • A - melee
  • X - ranged
  • B - dash
  • Y - use
  • Keyboard - unfinished
  • WASD - walk and aim
  • K - melee
  • L - ranged
  • SPACE - dash
  • F - use
  • discord: https://discord.gg/bWxcZjn
  • twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/lentsius

This is an alpha build of the game for testing purposes. Join us on discord or follow the twitch streams we do to stay up to date with the development of the game, also send us loads of feedback! The game has a built in feedback form which you trigger by pressing F1
